pr_title: [2.20.x] DDF-5907 - Fix Spellcheck Showing Results For capability

timeline.bodyText: ✏️ Possibly worth changing the method name to maybe something like findBestCollation or something that matches the return value more appropriately.
timeline.author: cantstoptheunk

timeline.bodyText: ✏️ Should we do a null check here for the case that the solrResponse.getSpellCheckResponse().getCollatedResults() has size 0 inside the findQueryToResend method which will return null and then we would get an null exception here.
timeline.author: cantstoptheunk

replies.bodyText: It won't actually get to this line if that is true.  The if statement above verifies that there are collated results
replies.author: derekwilhelm

replies.bodyText: Nice. Looks good to me then.
replies.author: cantstoptheunk

timeline.message: DDF-5907 - Fix spellcheck Showing Results For
Change corrections to use a set
Change corrections to use a set
Update to use sets but return lists
